name: Market of Freedonia
description:
Welcome to Freedonia.  It is October, 1918.  You live with your family in a small, rural Freedonian town, and you lead a normal life.  However, as the Great War comes to a close across the sea, you hear rumours that a deadly sickness has arrived on the continent.  It is a time of change, and you need to be ready to adapt if you are to take care of your family.

Controls:

WASD to Move

E to Interact

Click on Buttons

Note: Please download the pc version (win). the webgl version seems not happy about using fmod.

Game Jam Challenges:

  • Extra Historian
  • Extra Distance
